Description: United Cooperative Assurance (known as: UCA) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since June 2008. UCA operates within the Insurance sector focusing on Property and Casualty Insurance. It has company operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Property and Casualty Insurance. UCA is based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia and was established in May 2008.
